OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'flashpoint'.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

FLASHPOINT_API_KEY.description: The API key to connect to Flashpoint.

FLASHPOINT_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: The date from which to start importing data.

FLASHPOINT_IMPORT_REPORTS.description: Whether to import reports from Flashpoint or not.

FLASHPOINT_INDICATORS_IN_REPORTS.description: Whether to include indicators in the reports imported from MispFeed or not.

FLASHPOINT_GUESS_RELATIONSHIPS_FROM_REPO.description: Whether to guess relationships between entities or not.

FLASHPOINT_IMPORT_INDICATORS.description: WHether to import indicators of compromise (IoCs) or not.

FLASHPOINT_IMPORT_ALERTS.description: Whether to import alert data from Flashpoint or not.

FLASHPOINT_ALERT_CREATE_RELATED_ENTITIES.description: Whether to create alert related Channel entity and Media-Content observable or not.

FLASHPOINT_IMPORT_COMMUNITIES.description: Whether to import community data or not.

FLASHPOINT_COMMUNITIES_QUERIES.description: List of community queries to execute.

FLASHPOINT_IMPORT_CCM_ALERTS.description: Whether to import Compromised Credentials Monitoring alerts or not.

FLASHPOINT_FRESH_CCM_ALERTS_ONLY.description: Whether to import only fresh Compromised Credentials Monitoring alerts or all of them.
